text.section: It is a deceptive trade practice for a sales agent to violate any requirement of this subtitle.

If the sales agent violates any provision of this subtitle, the purchaser:
May cancel the contract by notifying the seller in any manner, by any means, and at any time of the purchaser's intention to cancel; and
Is entitled to a refund of:
All moneys paid; and
Until the refund is made, interest of 1% for each month after the date of cancellation.
